q: In Oracle, which of the following statements about the TRUNCATE table_name command is incorrect?

a.option: It is a DDL statement, hence it cannot be rolled back.
It does not affect any structures associated with the table that is getting truncated or authorized.
If a user has the DROP ANY TABLE system privilege,then he or she can truncate a table or cluster in any schema.
A TRUNCATE statement deletes rows from a table therefore, triggers associated with the table are not deleted.

q: In Oracle, which of the following packages is used to collect statistics about the physical storage characteristics of a table, index, or cluster?
In Oracle, which of the following packages is used to detect and repair corrupt blocks in tables and indexes?
In Oracle, which of the following commands cannot be executed successfully?

a.option: grant all on table@db_link to user

q: In Oracle, which of the following types of links is not a valid type of database link?
In Oracle, which of the following statements best defines a heterogeneous database system?

a.option: A distributed database system in which all databases are Oracle databases working on different operating systems.
A distributed database system in which both Oracle and non oracle databases are equal in number.
A distributed database system in which at least one of the databases is a non-Oracle database.
A distributed database system in which all databases are Oracle databases working on different versions.

q: In Oracle, which of the following commands is used to modify domain in a global database name?

a.option:
update V$PARAMETER
set VALUE = "database.domain"
where name = 'db_domain'
ALTER DATABASE RENAME GLOBAL_NAME TO database.domain;

q: In Oracle, if an object is dropped and re-created, then which of the following statements about its privilege is correct?

a.option: It has to be revoked before dropping an object, else the DROP command will return an error.
If the object is created immediately after implementing the DROP command, then it is automatically re-granted.

q: In Oracle, if us.americas.warehouse.com is a network domain, then what is the valid global database name of the inventory database present in the network domain?
In Oracle, which of the following SYS tables contains passwords for all links in a database?
In Oracle, which of the following statements about the RENAME command is incorrect?

a.option: All views and PL or SQL program units dependent on a renamed object become invalid, and must be recompiled before next use.
All synonyms for a renamed object return an error when used.
Integrity constraints, indexes, and grants made for the object are not carried forward for the new name.
Table, view, sequence, or a private synonym of a table, view, or sequence can be renamed using the RENAME statement.

q: In Oracle, the OPTIMIZER_MODE parameter should be set to CHOOSE or COST to enable the cost-based optimization. Which of the following approach is used to set this parameter?

a.option: Modifying the OPTIMIZER_MODE parameter in the initialization parameter file
Setting it at session level by issuing an ALTER SESSION statement
